title: How Magazine
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922050719/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Publications](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922050719/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Publications) : How Magazine**

**Publisher:** F&W Publications (USA)  
**Frequency:** Bi-monthly

An American graphic design magazine that features practical information on technology, business tips, helpful resources and designer profiles. Each volume features a business annual, a self promotion competition and an interacive competition. Since 1991 How has also been responsible for holding the annual [How Design Conference](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922050719/http:/www.howconference.com/) all over North America.

F&W Publications also publish [Print Magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922050719/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Print%20Magazine) and [ID Magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922050719/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ID%20Magazine).

**Website:** [www.howdesign.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922050719/http:/www.howdesign.com/)
author: Conor
